attributes.action: introduce means-tested self-funding for people sentenced to prison.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We believe it is unfair that the elderley are forced to sell their homes to fund care, that students must fund their own education and school children must fund their own uniforms and meals, whilst criminals sentenced to prison are fully funded by the taxpayer.

If a person who owns their own home, has significant savings or other form of income, commits a crime, they should be means tested and contribute all or a partial amount towards their upkeep.

If you commit the crime, you should pay for the time! JUSTICE FOR HONEST PEOPLE!!
